object.name: house_plan
object.property:
<model xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="address" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>911 Address</title> </field> <field name="submitter" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>The person that filled out the Information report, in the Name field</description> <required>False</required> <title>Submitter</title> </field> <field name="zip_code" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>True</required> <title>Zip Code</title> </field> <field name="adult_occupants" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description>Number of adults in the house</description> <required>False</required> <title>Adult Occupants</title> </field> <field name="children_occupants" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description>Number of children in the house</description> <required>False</required> <title>Children Occupants</title> </field> <field name="elderly_occupants" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description>Number of elderly persons in the house</description> <required>False</required> <title>Elderly Occupants</title> </field> <field name="special_needs" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description>If occupants have any special needs, explain here</description> <required>False</required> <title>Special Needs</title> </field> <field name="contact_1_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contact 1 Name</title> </field> <field name="contact_1_number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contact 1 Number</title> </field> <field name="contact_2_name" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contact 2 Name</title> </field> <field name="contact_2_number" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Contact 2 Number</title> </field> <field name="property_type" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Property Type</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Residence</element> <element>Business</element> <element>Farm Operation</element> <element>Rental Property</element> <element>Other</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="lessor" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>If this is a rental property, name of the current Lessor</description> <required>False</required> <title>Lessor</title> </field> <field name="property_information" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>If property type is "other", provide more information here</description> <required>False</required> <title>Property Information</title> </field> <field name="square_footage" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Square Footage</title> </field> <field name="multi_level" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if house has more than one floor</description> <required>False</required> <title>Multi-level</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="basement" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the building has a basement</description> <required>False</required> <title>Basement</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="year_built" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description>Approximate year of the original construction</description> <required>False</required> <title>Year Built</title> </field> <field name="additions" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the building has had additions</description> <required>False</required> <title>Additions</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="construction_type" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Construction Type</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Wood Frame</element> <element>Prefab</element> <element>Steel Frame</element> <element>Concrete/Masonry</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="basement_sleeping_area" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the basement has a sleeping area</description> <required>False</required> <title>Basement Sleeping Area</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="basement_exterior_entrance" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the basement has an exterior entrance</description> <required>False</required> <title>Basement Exterior Entrance</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="garage" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the house has a garage</description> <required>False</required> <title>Garage</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="garage_attached" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the garage is attached</description> <required>False</required> <title>Garage Attached</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="garage_heated" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the garage is heated</description> <required>False</required> <title>Garage Heated</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="garage_heat_type" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Garage Heat Type</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>LP</element> <element>Natural Gas</element> <element>Wood</element> <element>Other</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="business" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if any type of business is operated in the residence</description> <required>False</required> <title>Business</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="business_information" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Details of the business operated in the residence</description> <required>False</required> <title>Business Information</title> </field> <field name="operational_smoke_detectors" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the residence has operational smoke detectors</description> <required>False</required> <title>Operational Smoke Detectors</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="co_detectors" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the residence has CO Detector(s)</description> <required>False</required> <title>CO Detectors</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="automated_alarm_system" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the residence has an automated fire alarm system</description> <required>False</required> <title>Automated Alarm System</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="sprinkler_system" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the building has a sprinkler system</description> <required>False</required> <title>Sprinkler System</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="water_supply" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if there is a nearby water supply for fire-fighting</description> <required>False</required> <title>Water Supply</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="water_supply_type" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Water Supply Type</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Pool</element> <element>Wall or Large Capacity Pump</element> <element>Lagoon, Pond, or Lake</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="water_supply_size" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description>Size in gallons of the pool</description> <required>False</required> <title>Water Supply Size</title> </field> <field name="water_supply_access" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if there is year-round access for fire trucks</description> <required>False</required> <title>Water Supply Access</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="large_trucks_prohibited" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>If the roadway or driveway prohibits access of large trucks, provide information</description> <required>False</required> <title>Large Trucks Prohibited</title> </field> <field name="special_concerns_text" type="plone.app.textfield.RichText"> <description>Provide information about special concerns or hazards not already mentioned</description> <required>False</required> <title>Special Concerns</title> </field>
<fieldset name="utilities" label="Utilities" description="Information about the utilities provided"> <field name="electrical_provider" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Electrical Provider</title> </field> <field name="electrical_shut_off_location" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Location of the electrical shut off or meter box</description> <required>False</required> <title>Electrical Shut Off Location</title> </field> <field name="automatic_backup_generator" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if the building has an automatic backup generator</description> <required>False</required> <title>Automatic Backup Generator</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="generator_transfer_switch" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description>If there is an automatic generator, type of transfer switch</description> <required>False</required> <title>Generator Transfer Switch</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>No switch</element> <element>Automatic switch</element> <element>Manual switch</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="generator_location" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Generator Location</title> </field> <field name="type_of_heat" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Type of Heat</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>LP</element> <element>Natural Gas</element> <element>Wood</element> <element>Electric</element> <element>Solar/Geo-Thermal</element> <element>Wood Stove</element> <element>Fireplace</element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="gas_provider" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Gas Provider</title> </field> <field name="gas_shut_off_valve" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if there is a shut-off valve for the gas</description> <required>False</required> <title>Gas Shut-Off Valve</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="gas_shut_off_valve_location" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Gas Shut-Off Valve Location</title> </field> <field name="lp_tank_location" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>LP Tank Location</title> </field> <field name="backup_power_storage" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if there is solar or battery backup power storage</description> <required>False</required> <title>Backup Power Storage</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> </fieldset> <fieldset name="outbuildings" label="Outbuildings"> <field name="special_concerns" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Special Concerns</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <values> <element>Machine Shed</element> <element>On Farm Chemical Storage</element> <element>Utility/Maintenance Shed</element> <element>Diesel Fuel Storage</element> <element>Gasoline Storage</element> <element>Livestock Confinement</element> <element>Livestock Waste Pit</element> <element>Harvester Type Storage</element> <element>Grain Facility</element> <element>Grain Dryer Bin</element> <element>Continuous Flow Grain Dryer</element> <element>Ammunition, Black Powder, or Reloading Supplies</element> <element>Home Oxygen Bottles</element> <element></element> </values> </value_type> </field> <field name="diesel_storage_size" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description>Size of diesel storage in gallons</description> <required>False</required> <title>Diesel Storage Size</title> </field> <field name="gasoline_storage_size" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description>Size of gasoline storage in gallons</description> <required>False</required> <title>Gasoline Storage Size</title> </field> <field name="natural_gas_to_buildings" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if there is natural gas to the grain dryer and/or buildings</description> <required>False</required> <title>Natural Gas to Buildings</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="natural_gas_shut_off" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description>Location of the natural gas shut-off</description> <required>False</required> <title>Natural Gas Shut Off</title> </field> <field name="lp_gas_to_buildings" type="zope.schema.Bool"> <description>True if there is LP gas to the grain dryer and/or buildings</description> <required>False</required> <title>LP Gas to Buildings</title> <form:widget type="z3c.form.browser.radio.RadioFieldWidget"/> </field> <field name="lp_tank_location_secondary" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>LP Tank Location (secondary)</title> </field> <field name="lp_tank_size_secondary" type="zope.schema.Int"> <description>Size in gallons of the secondary LP tank</description> <required>False</required> <title>LP Tank Size (secondary)</title> </field> </fieldset> </schema> </model>
